nodes.text: Shon Ti'Ja, a male Nautolan, was a crime boss on the planet Wielu. By the year 22 BBY, he owned an assortment of creatings—a sloat, a snake-like creation; several saberfish in a pit of water; and at least two other creatures. When Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi and the smuggler Rook Pryce were on Wielu, Ti'Ja used his creatures to defeat them, though he failed and surrendered.
